pullrequest.title: Added a Lightware sf30 LRF sensor

content.raw:
Hi @katanachan , thanks for the contribution! A few comments to start with:

* Does the model load properly for you? I only get a couple of tiny scattered collisions, a ray sensor and the visuals don't show up:

    ![pr233.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/EgGzpd/images/2401257161-pr233.png)

* Could you please add the model to `CMakeLists.txt`?
content.html:
Hi @katanachan , thanks for the contribution! A few comments to start with:

  • Does the model load properly for you? I only get a couple of tiny scattered collisions, a ray sensor and the visuals don't show up:

  • Could you please add the model to CMakeLists.txt?
